name: Zippered Clutch Purse - Tree / Leaf red/black/teal
description:
This zippered clutch purse is perfect for your little necessities - whether you're heading to the market, or a night out on the town. Perhaps you'll fill it with your latest crochet pieces, and some little gathered collections..... I'm sure your daughter would love it too.

Hand screen printed with our tree print in eye-catching brightest red and jet black, over-printed with our new teal lacework:leafwork design. The print is layered up bit by bit, colour and pattern overlapping in a very pleasing manner. Print placement varies for each purse.

Soft yet durable hemp / organic cotton basecloth will last for years and years. Lined with perfect black hemp fabric. Gold metal zipper makes the whole purse zing in an extra special way!

Purse is 20cm x 21cm, wrist strap fits perfectly and comfortably. 

Hand printed and sewn by us at our home studio in Crystal Creek, Northern NSW.

name: Tea Towel Red Pears 100% linen
description:
How delicious! This design, 'Pear Shaped', was originally hand drawn by Ellie Beck. Brighten up your kitchen with this yummy tea towel, in either juicy green or tasty red.

100% linen tea towel. Hand screen printed in Australia, using water-based, solvent free inks. 50 x 70cm (approx) this is a generously sized tea towel. Linen is the most absorbent fabric for drying your wet dishes, and lasts for many many years of kitchen duty.

We've been told our tea towels are too beautiful to use, many of our customers frame them to look at on their walls. We say let's raise the mundane daily duties by using beautiful, handcrafted, lovingly designed items!

name: Tea Towel Potter's Daugher 100% Linen
description:
"Potter's Daughter" was inspired by my mother, who (among many other talents) was a potter. Many of these pots, tea cups and bowls are shapes I grew up using and seeing in my everyday life.
The original design was hand drawn by Ellie Beck for Red Seed Studio.

100% linen tea towel. Hand screen printed in Australia, using water-based, solvent free inks. 50 x 70cm (approx) this is a generously sized tea towel. Linen is the most absorbent fabric for drying your wet dishes, and lasts for many many years of kitchen duty.
Printed in brightest red - it's spark up your kitchen conversation. {Please contact us if you would like it in another colour}.

We've been told our tea towels are too beautiful to use, many of our customers frame them to look at on their walls. We say let's raise the mundane daily duties by using beautiful, handcrafted, lovingly designed items!

name: Tea Towel Clouds 100% Linen
description:
"Clouds" is an original hand drawn image, by Sam Messina. Inspired by Japanese imagery, these clouds will help you float away while you do the dishes!

100% linen tea towel. Hand screen printed in Australia, using water-based, solvent free inks. 50 x 70cm (approx) this is a generously sized tea towel. Linen is the most absorbent fabric for drying your wet dishes, and lasts for many many years of kitchen duty.
Printed in brilliant blue. {Please contact us if you would like it in another colour}.

We've been told our tea towels are too beautiful to use, many of our customers frame them to look at on their walls. We say let's raise the mundane daily duties by using beautiful, handcrafted, lovingly designed items!
